allProducts.title: THE ORIGINAL NO SUGAR ADDED HICKORY SMOKED UNCURED BACON (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

The original. The bacon that blazed its path across the pork landscape and made Pederson's a household name. This is bacon without sugar. Simple enough, right? Turns out making bacon without artificial nitrates or nitrites is tough. Take sugar out of the equation and, for many, well you have a down-right conundrum. Then the cowboys and cowgirls at Pederson's Natural Farms went and did it. The rest is history. If you want to get in on that, here's your chance. This bacon will change the way you look at bacon, and you'll want more of it. This is Whole30 Approved. It's AIP diet friendly. It fits right into Paleo and Keto lifestyles.

The process of getting this bacon from pasture to plate is whittled down to the essentials. Minimal processing. The seasonings get soaked in over time, not injected all at once. Slabs of pork smoked by all natural hickory chips and perfectly sliced. Humanely raised, these animals get the life they deserve, with no growth stimulants or antibiotics. You won't find any MSG, gluten, or lactose here. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients. All natural uncured bacon. If there's a better way to make bacon, we haven't found it yet.

allProducts.title: 100% GRASS-FED ORGANIC GROUND BEEF (3 PACK)
allProducts.description:
We’re gonna be straight shooters here. This isn’t your run of the mill supermarket shelf beef. In the past, you’d have to know someone that was raising their own cows to find this kind of beef. You’d have to go to the butcher. You’d have to establish a relationship with someone that cared deeply about the meat they were producing. In that equation, we’re that someone. That’s the work we’ve done to bring you this beef. We care greatly about the quality of the protein we eat ourselves, the protein we serve our families, and lastly the protein we send to you. We’ve made it so that you just have to visit our website to bring the best to your door, and it’s out of a mission to bring people the highest quality experience and product. We want to build that relationship with you, and be your go-to source for high-quality protein you can depend on.

This beef is 100% grass-fed. Not grass-started, grass-sometimes, or grass-finished. No GMO’s or pesticides here. No artificial ingredients or preservatives. This meat has never been exposed to any growth stimulants or antibiotics, and it’s handled with care from pasture to plate. It’s 1lb of 85% lean beef, and nothing else. Whole30 approved, Keto and Paleo-friendly - this is the best made better.

allProducts.title: ORGANIC NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED SMOKED BACON (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 8 oz. packages.

Food starts with farmers. Old fashioned food starts with old fashioned approaches. We are no strangers to technology, but we are strangers to cutting corners. We're strangers to putting profit over product. These organic products are about attaining the highest of quality for everyone involved. We work with self-sustaining family farms, good stewards of land and animals alike. We have and feel an ethical obligation to provide our animals with a comfortable life. Not only do our farmers raise their pigs right, but they also grow much of the grain used to feed those pigs. This makes for a higher quality feed that's always free of animal by-products. These animals live in open pens, they get to see the sky. They have open air. They romp, frolic, and engage in natural behavior. Our pigs grow slower than those at industrial “farms,” and we don't mind. It's more natural because we raise pigs without growth hormones or antibiotics. It’s a better life for the pigs and produces the best pork we’ve ever eaten.

We’ve partnered with these farmers because they share our values. Our goal is to produce the best bacon in the best ways. Our pork bellies are never injected with anything at any point in the process. No liquid smoke… ever. We use straight from the kitchen real, natural seasonings. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients. Next, we smoke the bellies using real wood chips. A smoky flavor should come from actually smoking the meat instead of faking it with liquid smoke. Our final step is to slice the chilled bellies into strips of bacon and put it in a package. Easy enough, right? Seasoned. Smoked. Sliced. It’s a natural process with no complicated steps… kind of like our uncured bacon… no nonsense, just natural. Whole30 Approved.

INGREDIENTS: ORGANIC PORK, WATER, VINEGAR (MADE WITH ORGANIC INGREDIENTS), SALT, CELERY POWDER.

allProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED OLD WORLD KIELBASA (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 14 oz. packages.

 

 

Pederson’s received a lot of requests for this Old World Kielbasa. We’re big on bringing products our customers are searching for to market and then straight to their front door. This rope sausage doesn’t have any added sugar, and it’s old-fashioned seasoning makes it a hit wherever it lands. It has a traditional kielbasa flavor profile that compliments a wide variety of dinner staples, and according to our in-house tasting team of Pederson's kiddos, it’s a sausage that’s sure to be in high demand amongst your family.

The pork this sausage is made from is humanely raised. Our animals aren’t subjected to growth stimulants or antibiotics, and they’re brought up on high quality vegetarian feed that’s free from animal by-products. You won’t find any MSG or lactose here, and we never use artificial ingredients or preservatives. This sausage comes in gluten free without any added sugar, and there’s no artificial nitrates or nitrites to be found. This is a Whole30 Approved protein the whole family can enjoy!

allProducts.title: UNCURED NO SUGAR BUCKIN' BACON (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

This bacon bucks trends, then starts them. Pederson's Buckin' Bacon comes from the center of the pork shoulder instead of the belly. This makes for bacon that's much more lean, which makes for a product that's higher in protein and lower in fat. It's a beautiful cut and has earned its place in our product line. This is a good place to start for a low fat, high protein alternative to traditional bacon. It's an artisanal style with a practical purpose and a taste all its own. There's no sugar added, so it's Whole30 Approved. It's also safe to eat for those of us adhering to the AIP diet or living a Keto or Paleo lifestyle.

Like the rest of Pederson's Natural Farms products, this meat is raised humanely. There's no antibiotics or growth stimulants here. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients, no added nitrates or nitrites. All natural seasoning and as little processing as possible to get it on your plate. You can taste the difference. We hang our hat on the quality of our products.

allProducts.title: UNCURED NO SUGAR ADDED HICKORY SMOKED TURKEY BACON (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

Turkey and bacon. To be honest, without the word ‘and’ in that sentence, it's kind of an odd statement. Isn't bacon made from the belly of a pig? Well, yes. Thing is, even we'll admit that sometimes pork doesn't have to be on the menu. So we did our best to come up with something we'd be proud to eat when we weren't looking to eat pork. The results, well, you'll have to taste them for yourself (we're pretty proud).

When these turkeys hatch, we make sure someone is there to oink at them. Once they're old enough to fend for themselves, they're raised next to our pigs and grow up side by side. We're pretty sure these turkeys think they're pigs.

That might not all be true, but it's fun to imagine. What is true is that we slice this turkey like bacon. We season this turkey like bacon, and we smoke it with natural hickory chips. Just like our bacon. It's uncured, and there's no sugar added. No artificial ingredients and no preservatives. This turkey isn't raised in cages, and it gets a chance to grow with no antibiotics or growth stimulants - ever. This MSG and gluten free bird bacon is perfect for the Paleo or Keto lifestyle, and we invite you to try it today. Whole30 Approved.

allProducts.content:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

Turkey and bacon. To be honest, without the word ‘and’ in that sentence, it's kind of an odd statement. Isn't bacon made from the belly of a pig? Well, yes. Thing is, even we'll admit that sometimes pork doesn't have to be on the menu. So we did our best to come up with something we'd be proud to eat when we weren't looking to eat pork. The results, well, you'll have to taste them for yourself (we're pretty proud).

When these turkeys hatch, we make sure someone is there to oink at them. Once they're old enough to fend for themselves, they're raised next to our pigs and grow up side by side. We're pretty sure these turkeys think they're pigs.

That might not all be true, but it's fun to imagine. What is true is that we slice this turkey like bacon. We season this turkey like bacon, and we smoke it with natural hickory chips. Just like our bacon. It's uncured, and there's no sugar added. No artificial ingredients and no preservatives. This turkey isn't raised in cages, and it gets a chance to grow with no antibiotics or growth stimulants - ever. This MSG and gluten free bird bacon is perfect for the Paleo or Keto lifestyle, and we invite you to try it today. Whole30 Approved.

allProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED DRY RUB BACON (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

Let me tell you, this bacon took some time to perfect. Long hours, weekends, batch after batch. Bottom line, seasonings are a serious topic at Pederson's, and this bacon speaks to that fact. We rub this uncured bacon in a top secret recipe. The one thing we can tell you is that there's no sugar in it. That's all we're gonna give away. Well, that and the juniper berries. We love those juniper berries.

So, it's rubbed with and rolled in the secret spices. It's smoked the old fashioned way, with chipped wood over fire. Our Vice President Neil Dudley hums 'Amarillo By Morning' while it's sliced. This bacon goes through minimal processing, but 'Amarillo By Morning' always gets hummed.

We're talking about a bacon that's Whole30 approved, friendly to the AIP diet, and Keto and Paleo ready. There's no MSG here, no gluten, no lactose - and we do it without adding nitrates or nitrites. We may like to spin a yarn here and there, but this bacon is about as good as it gets. Pederson's Natural Farms makes the best, better.

allProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED BEEF HOT DOGS (5 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Five (5) 12 oz. packages.

We’ll be frank, hot dogs have gotten a bad rap. We don’t think it has to be that way. There’s so much going for a good hot dog, and we’ve made the best of the best here. We do have to admit that our bacon dogs are close contenders. What you need to know is that these are 100% grass-fed beef, so you won’t have to wonder what it is you’re eating while you’re enjoying them. You’ll have peace of mind that there’s no preservatives, no artificial ingredients, and best of all - NO SUGAR in these dogs. That’s right, these are Whole30 Approved and Keto/Paleo friendly. Throw these on the grill, and you’ll have a quick turnaround, high quality protein the whole family can enjoy.

Serve these up to your family, your friends, and be ready to send them our way when they start asking questions. We leave out anything that isn’t necessary, all that’s left is quality meat. These hot dogs are sourced from animals that are cared for, brought up without growth stimulants or antibiotics, and allowed to grow at a natural pace. We make the best better at Pederson’s, and we do it with you and your family in mind.

allProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED DOUBLE SMOKED BRATWURST (5 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Five (5) 12 oz. packages.

Fully cooked and double smoked, these bratwursts are bursting at the seams with smoked flavor. If you didn’t know, these are inspired by traditional German seasoning techniques and bring their own unique taste to your plate. This is Pederson’s ode to old-fashioned Bavarian sausage, and they fit in well with a wide variety of dishes. Grab yourself a pack or two and a few of the other link line sausages Pederson’s offers. You’ll have an opportunity to distinguish what sets these styles apart, all while enjoying some of the best all natural sausage on the market!

These brats don’t have any added sugar, and they’re sourced from animals that are raised with a quality of life necessary to make quality protein. Our farms feed their animals high quality, all vegetarian feed - no animal by-products to speak of. There’s no such thing as growth stimulants or antibiotics here... our animals are allowed to grow at a natural pace. We have patience because it takes patience to make a great product. You won’t find any artificial ingredients or preservatives here, and we don’t do any processing to these brats that isn’t absolutely necessary to deliver a quality product to you.

allProducts.title: SPIRAL SLICED NO SUGAR ADDED BONELESS SMOKED UNCURED HAM (1 PACK)
allProducts.description:
One (1) 4-6 lb. ham.

These fully cooked spiral sliced hams, well they just can’t be beat. We tried. We bested ourselves until we were plum tuckered out. That’s how we got here. Trial and error, to spice or not to spice until every amount was just right. We think we found a winner, and we’re sure you’ll agree. These hams are the traditional go-to option for family holidays for good reason, but we’re here to tell you that they aren’t just for holidays. They’re for all sorts of days. Thursdays, Fridays, even Mondays deserve some of the best ham you’ll find on the face of the earth. That’s how confident we are in these hams. We’re proud of these 4-6lb boneless behemoths. They’re as at home next to a turkey and a pot of mashed potatoes as they are between slices of bread - or thickly cut across the plate from a pair of over-easy eggs. Endless options we’ll leave you to explore.

Like the rest of the products our customers have come to love, these are produced lovingly and with quality in mind. We don’t just believe in quality products but in quality of life for the animals that help us make them. Pederson’s Natural Farms works with farmers that care about their animals - they’re raised naturally without growth stimulants or antibiotics. They have room to roam. They’re fed exclusively on vegetarian feed, with no animal by-products. There’s no preservatives or artificial ingredients, and these hams make it to your table with no more processing than absolutely necessary to ensure their quality. You won’t find any added sugar here either, so they’re a high quality source of protein that’s Whole30 Approved, Keto and Paleo friendly.

allProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED KIELBASA (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 14 oz. packages.

Kielbasa is the Polish word for sausage, and that’s where this sausage claims its roots. Often served with fried onions and cooked a multitude of ways, this sausage is versatile. You can grill it, boil it, smoke it, sear it, slice it up and kebab it - bottom line, you can get creative. This sausage is fully cooked, so it can save you time without sparing any flavor.

It may make for a quick meal, but you should know this sausage wasn’t made by cutting corners. Pederson’s Natural Farms raises animals the slow way, without growth stimulants or antibiotics. This pork was raised on a vegetarian diet free from animal by-products on farms where they have room to roam. Every step taken to get this product to your plate is essential, with no extra preservatives or artificial ingredients added in. There’s also no sugar here, so this meat is Whole30 Approved as well as being Keto and Paleo friendly. This is truly all natural protein for you and your family, and we wouldn’t have it any other way.

allProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED SPICY BREAKFAST SAUSAGE (5 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Five (5) 16 oz. packages.

We like spicing things up around here, and this No Sugar Added Spicy Breakfast Sausage is a result of that. This is one for the books, and we’ll wager it’s the best on the market. It’s just that good. We know the word breakfast is in the title, but don’t let that stop you from eating it any time of day. This no sugar sausage is at home in a taco as it is next to eggs. You’ll have no problem spicing up your meals with this meat, and it’ll leave folks coming back for more.

A big part of this sausage being the best starts at the farm. Our farmers take care of their animals, giving them room to roam and letting them live out their lives naturally. There’s no antibiotics or growth stimulants used to speed things along. There’s no artificial ingredients or preservatives here, because we take the word natural seriously. We don’t over process this meat, we just do what it takes to get it from our farms to your plate in as few steps as possible. You’ll also see that this sausage contains zero sugar - completely sugar free. That means it’s Whole30 Approved, as well as being Keto and Paleo friendly. You’re gonna love it.

We don’t over process this meat, we just do what it takes to get it from our farms to your plate in as few steps as possible. You’ll also see that this sausage contains zero sugar - completely sugar free. That means it’s Whole30 Approved, as well as being Keto and Paleo friendly. You’re gonna love it.

When it comes to Pederson’s products, you can have your taste and eat it, too! These sausages don’t have any added sugar, and they come from pork that’s raised right. Our animals are brought up on high quality vegetarian feed that’s free from animal by-products. They aren’t given any antibiotics or growth hormones, and they grow out naturally. Minimal processing goes into getting this product to you, and you won’t find any preservatives or artificial ingredients. This is a product that’s produced with quality in mind, and it shows.

allProducts.title: PORK TENDERLOIN
allProducts.description:
Pederson’s pork comes from Duroc-sired hogs making it some of the juiciest, most tender pork you can find! A product of the United States, their pork is beautifully pink in color and perfectly marbled.

Pork tenderloin is the leanest, most tender cut from the inside of the tail end of the loin on the hogs back. It is much smaller than a pork loin roast, so it cooks quickly and is a great choice for weeknight meals. Avoid drying it out by not over cooking.

allProducts.title: 100% GRASS-FED ORGANIC GROUND BEEF (3 PACK)
allProducts.description:
We’re gonna be straight shooters here. This isn’t your run of the mill supermarket shelf beef. In the past, you’d have to know someone that was raising their own cows to find this kind of beef. You’d have to go to the butcher. You’d have to establish a relationship with someone that cared deeply about the meat they were producing. In that equation, we’re that someone. That’s the work we’ve done to bring you this beef. We care greatly about the quality of the protein we eat ourselves, the protein we serve our families, and lastly the protein we send to you. We’ve made it so that you just have to visit our website to bring the best to your door, and it’s out of a mission to bring people the highest quality experience and product. We want to build that relationship with you, and be your go-to source for high-quality protein you can depend on.

This beef is 100% grass-fed. Not grass-started, grass-sometimes, or grass-finished. No GMO’s or pesticides here. No artificial ingredients or preservatives. This meat has never been exposed to any growth stimulants or antibiotics, and it’s handled with care from pasture to plate. It’s 1lb of 85% lean beef, and nothing else. Whole30 approved, Keto and Paleo-friendly - this is the best made better.

allProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED DOUBLE SMOKED BRATWURST (5 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Five (5) 12 oz. packages.

Fully cooked and double smoked, these bratwursts are bursting at the seams with smoked flavor. If you didn’t know, these are inspired by traditional German seasoning techniques and bring their own unique taste to your plate. This is Pederson’s ode to old-fashioned Bavarian sausage, and they fit in well with a wide variety of dishes. Grab yourself a pack or two and a few of the other link line sausages Pederson’s offers. You’ll have an opportunity to distinguish what sets these styles apart, all while enjoying some of the best all natural sausage on the market!

These brats don’t have any added sugar, and they’re sourced from animals that are raised with a quality of life necessary to make quality protein. Our farms feed their animals high quality, all vegetarian feed - no animal by-products to speak of. There’s no such thing as growth stimulants or antibiotics here... our animals are allowed to grow at a natural pace. We have patience because it takes patience to make a great product. You won’t find any artificial ingredients or preservatives here, and we don’t do any processing to these brats that isn’t absolutely necessary to deliver a quality product to you.

Green chilis are a staple of the Southwest, so we figured we better get them into one of our sausages. This No Sugar Added Green Chili & Cheese Sausage has quickly become a big hit, and once you’ve tried it, well it’s easy to see why. For the chili pepper connoisseur, they’re a must have.

When it comes to Pederson’s products, you can have your taste and eat it, too! These sausages don’t have any added sugar, and they come from pork that’s raised right. Our animals are brought up on high quality vegetarian feed that’s free from animal by-products. They aren’t given any antibiotics or growth hormones, and they grow out naturally. Minimal processing goes into getting this product to you, and you won’t find any preservatives or artificial ingredients. This is a product that’s produced with quality in mind, and it shows.

Green chilis are a staple of the Southwest, so we figured we better get them into one of our sausages. This No Sugar Added Green Chili & Cheese Sausage has quickly become a big hit, and once you’ve tried it, well it’s easy to see why. For the chili pepper connoisseur, they’re a must have.

When it comes to Pederson’s products, you can have your taste and eat it, too! These sausages don’t have any added sugar, and they come from pork that’s raised right. Our animals are brought up on high quality vegetarian feed that’s free from animal by-products. They aren’t given any antibiotics or growth hormones, and they grow out naturally. Minimal processing goes into getting this product to you, and you won’t find any preservatives or artificial ingredients. This is a product that’s produced with quality in mind, and it shows.

allProducts.description:
Five (5) 16 oz. packages.

Features:

* Whole30 Approved, No Sugar added ground Italian sausage
* Vegetarian fed, raised humanely without antibiotics.
* Gluten, Lactose, and MSG free.
* Ships Frozen.

Like the rest of their product line, Pederson’s Natural Farms Italian Ground Sausage checks every box when it comes to health-conscious and humane protein production. This Italian Ground Sausage fits the bill, whether you’re putting it on pizza, in a pasta, or spicing up a perfectly balanced omelet. Pederson’s Italian Ground Sausage is minimally processed and infused with just the right amount of seasoning, without adding any sugar or artificial ingredients. It’ll cook up with a distinctive and characteristic Italian taste, yet that flavor profile strikes a balance with enough nuance to not overpower the rest of your dish. You’ll know it once you try it. If you’ve had Pederson's products in the past, you know they each set themselves apart from the competition in their own way. They make the best, better.

allProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED OLD WORLD KIELBASA (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 14 oz. packages.

 

 

Pederson’s received a lot of requests for this Old World Kielbasa. We’re big on bringing products our customers are searching for to market and then straight to their front door. This rope sausage doesn’t have any added sugar, and it’s old-fashioned seasoning makes it a hit wherever it lands. It has a traditional kielbasa flavor profile that compliments a wide variety of dinner staples, and according to our in-house tasting team of Pederson's kiddos, it’s a sausage that’s sure to be in high demand amongst your family.

The pork this sausage is made from is humanely raised. Our animals aren’t subjected to growth stimulants or antibiotics, and they’re brought up on high quality vegetarian feed that’s free from animal by-products. You won’t find any MSG or lactose here, and we never use artificial ingredients or preservatives. This sausage comes in gluten free without any added sugar, and there’s no artificial nitrates or nitrites to be found. This is a Whole30 Approved protein the whole family can enjoy!

allProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED SPICY BREAKFAST SAUSAGE (5 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Five (5) 16 oz. packages.

We like spicing things up around here, and this No Sugar Added Spicy Breakfast Sausage is a result of that. This is one for the books, and we’ll wager it’s the best on the market. It’s just that good. We know the word breakfast is in the title, but don’t let that stop you from eating it any time of day. This no sugar sausage is at home in a taco as it is next to eggs. You’ll have no problem spicing up your meals with this meat, and it’ll leave folks coming back for more.

A big part of this sausage being the best starts at the farm. Our farmers take care of their animals, giving them room to roam and letting them live out their lives naturally. There’s no antibiotics or growth stimulants used to speed things along. There’s no artificial ingredients or preservatives here, because we take the word natural seriously. We don’t over process this meat, we just do what it takes to get it from our farms to your plate in as few steps as possible. You’ll also see that this sausage contains zero sugar - completely sugar free. That means it’s Whole30 Approved, as well as being Keto and Paleo friendly. You’re gonna love it.

allProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED BEEF HOT DOGS (5 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Five (5) 12 oz. packages.

We’ll be frank, hot dogs have gotten a bad rap. We don’t think it has to be that way. There’s so much going for a good hot dog, and we’ve made the best of the best here. We do have to admit that our bacon dogs are close contenders. What you need to know is that these are 100% grass-fed beef, so you won’t have to wonder what it is you’re eating while you’re enjoying them. You’ll have peace of mind that there’s no preservatives, no artificial ingredients, and best of all - NO SUGAR in these dogs. That’s right, these are Whole30 Approved and Keto/Paleo friendly. Throw these on the grill, and you’ll have a quick turnaround, high quality protein the whole family can enjoy.

Serve these up to your family, your friends, and be ready to send them our way when they start asking questions. We leave out anything that isn’t necessary, all that’s left is quality meat. These hot dogs are sourced from animals that are cared for, brought up without growth stimulants or antibiotics, and allowed to grow at a natural pace. We make the best better at Pederson’s, and we do it with you and your family in mind.

allProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED DRY RUB BACON (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

Let me tell you, this bacon took some time to perfect. Long hours, weekends, batch after batch. Bottom line, seasonings are a serious topic at Pederson's, and this bacon speaks to that fact. We rub this uncured bacon in a top secret recipe. The one thing we can tell you is that there's no sugar in it. That's all we're gonna give away. Well, that and the juniper berries. We love those juniper berries.

So, it's rubbed with and rolled in the secret spices. It's smoked the old fashioned way, with chipped wood over fire. Our Vice President Neil Dudley hums 'Amarillo By Morning' while it's sliced. This bacon goes through minimal processing, but 'Amarillo By Morning' always gets hummed.

We're talking about a bacon that's Whole30 approved, friendly to the AIP diet, and Keto and Paleo ready. There's no MSG here, no gluten, no lactose - and we do it without adding nitrates or nitrites. We may like to spin a yarn here and there, but this bacon is about as good as it gets. Pederson's Natural Farms makes the best, better.

allProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED KIELBASA (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 14 oz. packages.

Kielbasa is the Polish word for sausage, and that’s where this sausage claims its roots. Often served with fried onions and cooked a multitude of ways, this sausage is versatile. You can grill it, boil it, smoke it, sear it, slice it up and kebab it - bottom line, you can get creative. This sausage is fully cooked, so it can save you time without sparing any flavor.

It may make for a quick meal, but you should know this sausage wasn’t made by cutting corners. Pederson’s Natural Farms raises animals the slow way, without growth stimulants or antibiotics. This pork was raised on a vegetarian diet free from animal by-products on farms where they have room to roam. Every step taken to get this product to your plate is essential, with no extra preservatives or artificial ingredients added in. There’s also no sugar here, so this meat is Whole30 Approved as well as being Keto and Paleo friendly. This is truly all natural protein for you and your family, and we wouldn’t have it any other way.

allProducts.title: ORGANIC NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED SMOKED BACON (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 8 oz. packages.

Food starts with farmers. Old fashioned food starts with old fashioned approaches. We are no strangers to technology, but we are strangers to cutting corners. We're strangers to putting profit over product. These organic products are about attaining the highest of quality for everyone involved. We work with self-sustaining family farms, good stewards of land and animals alike. We have and feel an ethical obligation to provide our animals with a comfortable life. Not only do our farmers raise their pigs right, but they also grow much of the grain used to feed those pigs. This makes for a higher quality feed that's always free of animal by-products. These animals live in open pens, they get to see the sky. They have open air. They romp, frolic, and engage in natural behavior. Our pigs grow slower than those at industrial “farms,” and we don't mind. It's more natural because we raise pigs without growth hormones or antibiotics. It’s a better life for the pigs and produces the best pork we’ve ever eaten.

We’ve partnered with these farmers because they share our values. Our goal is to produce the best bacon in the best ways. Our pork bellies are never injected with anything at any point in the process. No liquid smoke… ever. We use straight from the kitchen real, natural seasonings. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients. Next, we smoke the bellies using real wood chips. A smoky flavor should come from actually smoking the meat instead of faking it with liquid smoke. Our final step is to slice the chilled bellies into strips of bacon and put it in a package. Easy enough, right? Seasoned. Smoked. Sliced. It’s a natural process with no complicated steps… kind of like our uncured bacon… no nonsense, just natural. Whole30 Approved.

INGREDIENTS: ORGANIC PORK, WATER, VINEGAR (MADE WITH ORGANIC INGREDIENTS), SALT, CELERY POWDER.

allProducts.title: SPIRAL SLICED NO SUGAR ADDED BONELESS SMOKED UNCURED HAM (1 PACK)
allProducts.description:
One (1) 4-6 lb. ham.

These fully cooked spiral sliced hams, well they just can’t be beat. We tried. We bested ourselves until we were plum tuckered out. That’s how we got here. Trial and error, to spice or not to spice until every amount was just right. We think we found a winner, and we’re sure you’ll agree. These hams are the traditional go-to option for family holidays for good reason, but we’re here to tell you that they aren’t just for holidays. They’re for all sorts of days. Thursdays, Fridays, even Mondays deserve some of the best ham you’ll find on the face of the earth. That’s how confident we are in these hams. We’re proud of these 4-6lb boneless behemoths. They’re as at home next to a turkey and a pot of mashed potatoes as they are between slices of bread - or thickly cut across the plate from a pair of over-easy eggs. Endless options we’ll leave you to explore.

Like the rest of the products our customers have come to love, these are produced lovingly and with quality in mind. We don’t just believe in quality products but in quality of life for the animals that help us make them. Pederson’s Natural Farms works with farmers that care about their animals - they’re raised naturally without growth stimulants or antibiotics. They have room to roam. They’re fed exclusively on vegetarian feed, with no animal by-products. There’s no preservatives or artificial ingredients, and these hams make it to your table with no more processing than absolutely necessary to ensure their quality. You won’t find any added sugar here either, so they’re a high quality source of protein that’s Whole30 Approved, Keto and Paleo friendly.

allProducts.title: SWEET GERMAN BRAND SMOKED UNCURED SAUSAGE (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 14 oz. packages.

Traditional German seasoning with a sweeter side, this smoked sausage has a flavor profile filled with nuance. This sausage is fully cooked, so it’s a meat that can be leaned on when you’re short on time - without being short on taste. Warm it up in the oven, on a pan, or throw it over flames. You’ll have no shortage of options here. Pederson’s line of rope sausages have a taste for every palate and are people pleasers every time they hit a plate.

You expect high standards and quality when you purchase Pederson’s products, and this sausage is no different. allProducts.title: THE ORIGINAL NO SUGAR ADDED HICKORY SMOKED UNCURED BACON (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

The original. The bacon that blazed its path across the pork landscape and made Pederson's a household name. This is bacon without sugar. Simple enough, right? Turns out making bacon without artificial nitrates or nitrites is tough. Take sugar out of the equation and, for many, well you have a down-right conundrum. Then the cowboys and cowgirls at Pederson's Natural Farms went and did it. The rest is history. If you want to get in on that, here's your chance. This bacon will change the way you look at bacon, and you'll want more of it. This is Whole30 Approved. It's AIP diet friendly. It fits right into Paleo and Keto lifestyles.

The process of getting this bacon from pasture to plate is whittled down to the essentials. Minimal processing. The seasonings get soaked in over time, not injected all at once. Slabs of pork smoked by all natural hickory chips and perfectly sliced. Humanely raised, these animals get the life they deserve, with no growth stimulants or antibiotics. You won't find any MSG, gluten, or lactose here. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients. All natural uncured bacon. If there's a better way to make bacon, we haven't found it yet.

allProducts.title: UNCURED NO SUGAR ADDED HICKORY SMOKED TURKEY BACON (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

Turkey and bacon. To be honest, without the word ‘and’ in that sentence, it's kind of an odd statement. Isn't bacon made from the belly of a pig? Well, yes. Thing is, even we'll admit that sometimes pork doesn't have to be on the menu. So we did our best to come up with something we'd be proud to eat when we weren't looking to eat pork. The results, well, you'll have to taste them for yourself (we're pretty proud).

When these turkeys hatch, we make sure someone is there to oink at them. Once they're old enough to fend for themselves, they're raised next to our pigs and grow up side by side. We're pretty sure these turkeys think they're pigs.

That might not all be true, but it's fun to imagine. What is true is that we slice this turkey like bacon. We season this turkey like bacon, and we smoke it with natural hickory chips. Just like our bacon. It's uncured, and there's no sugar added. No artificial ingredients and no preservatives. This turkey isn't raised in cages, and it gets a chance to grow with no antibiotics or growth stimulants - ever. This MSG and gluten free bird bacon is perfect for the Paleo or Keto lifestyle, and we invite you to try it today. Whole30 Approved.

allProducts.title: UNCURED NO SUGAR BUCKIN' BACON (4 PACK)
allProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

This bacon bucks trends, then starts them. Pederson's Buckin' Bacon comes from the center of the pork shoulder instead of the belly. This makes for bacon that's much more lean, which makes for a product that's higher in protein and lower in fat. It's a beautiful cut and has earned its place in our product line. This is a good place to start for a low fat, high protein alternative to traditional bacon. It's an artisanal style with a practical purpose and a taste all its own. There's no sugar added, so it's Whole30 Approved. It's also safe to eat for those of us adhering to the AIP diet or living a Keto or Paleo lifestyle.

Like the rest of Pederson's Natural Farms products, this meat is raised humanely. There's no antibiotics or growth stimulants here. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients, no added nitrates or nitrites. All natural seasoning and as little processing as possible to get it on your plate. You can taste the difference. We hang our hat on the quality of our products.

subscribableProducts.title: 100% GRASS-FED ORGANIC GROUND BEEF (3 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
We’re gonna be straight shooters here. This isn’t your run of the mill supermarket shelf beef. In the past, you’d have to know someone that was raising their own cows to find this kind of beef. You’d have to go to the butcher. You’d have to establish a relationship with someone that cared deeply about the meat they were producing. In that equation, we’re that someone. That’s the work we’ve done to bring you this beef. We care greatly about the quality of the protein we eat ourselves, the protein we serve our families, and lastly the protein we send to you. We’ve made it so that you just have to visit our website to bring the best to your door, and it’s out of a mission to bring people the highest quality experience and product. We want to build that relationship with you, and be your go-to source for high-quality protein you can depend on.

This beef is 100% grass-fed. Not grass-started, grass-sometimes, or grass-finished. No GMO’s or pesticides here. No artificial ingredients or preservatives. This meat has never been exposed to any growth stimulants or antibiotics, and it’s handled with care from pasture to plate. It’s 1lb of 85% lean beef, and nothing else. Whole30 approved, Keto and Paleo-friendly - this is the best made better.

subscribableProducts.description:

subscribableProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED DOUBLE SMOKED BRATWURST (5 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
Five (5) 12 oz. packages.

Fully cooked and double smoked, these bratwursts are bursting at the seams with smoked flavor. If you didn’t know, these are inspired by traditional German seasoning techniques and bring their own unique taste to your plate. This is Pederson’s ode to old-fashioned Bavarian sausage, and they fit in well with a wide variety of dishes. Grab yourself a pack or two and a few of the other link line sausages Pederson’s offers. You’ll have an opportunity to distinguish what sets these styles apart, all while enjoying some of the best all natural sausage on the market!

These brats don’t have any added sugar, and they’re sourced from animals that are raised with a quality of life necessary to make quality protein. Our farms feed their animals high quality, all vegetarian feed - no animal by-products to speak of. There’s no such thing as growth stimulants or antibiotics here... our animals are allowed to grow at a natural pace. We have patience because it takes patience to make a great product. You won’t find any artificial ingredients or preservatives here, and we don’t do any processing to these brats that isn’t absolutely necessary to deliver a quality product to you.

When it comes to Pederson’s products, you can have your taste and eat it, too! These sausages don’t have any added sugar, and they come from pork that’s raised right. Minimal processing goes into getting this product to you, and you won’t find any preservatives or artificial ingredients. This is a product that’s produced with quality in mind, and it shows.

Features:

* Whole30 Approved, No Sugar added ground Italian sausage
* Vegetarian fed, raised humanely without antibiotics.

Like the rest of their product line, Pederson’s Natural Farms Italian Ground Sausage checks every box when it comes to health-conscious and humane protein production. This Italian Ground Sausage fits the bill, whether you’re putting it on pizza, in a pasta, or spicing up a perfectly balanced omelet. If you’ve had Pederson's products in the past, you know they each set themselves apart from the competition in their own way. They make the best, better.

subscribableProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED OLD WORLD KIELBASA (4 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
Four (4) 14 oz. packages.

 

 

Pederson’s received a lot of requests for this Old World Kielbasa. We’re big on bringing products our customers are searching for to market and then straight to their front door. This rope sausage doesn’t have any added sugar, and it’s old-fashioned seasoning makes it a hit wherever it lands. It has a traditional kielbasa flavor profile that compliments a wide variety of dinner staples, and according to our in-house tasting team of Pederson's kiddos, it’s a sausage that’s sure to be in high demand amongst your family.

The pork this sausage is made from is humanely raised. Our animals aren’t subjected to growth stimulants or antibiotics, and they’re brought up on high quality vegetarian feed that’s free from animal by-products. You won’t find any MSG or lactose here, and we never use artificial ingredients or preservatives. This sausage comes in gluten free without any added sugar, and there’s no artificial nitrates or nitrites to be found. This is a Whole30 Approved protein the whole family can enjoy!

subscribableProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED SPICY BREAKFAST SAUSAGE (5 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
Five (5) 16 oz. packages.

We like spicing things up around here, and this No Sugar Added Spicy Breakfast Sausage is a result of that. This is one for the books, and we’ll wager it’s the best on the market. It’s just that good. We know the word breakfast is in the title, but don’t let that stop you from eating it any time of day. This no sugar sausage is at home in a taco as it is next to eggs. You’ll have no problem spicing up your meals with this meat, and it’ll leave folks coming back for more.

A big part of this sausage being the best starts at the farm. Our farmers take care of their animals, giving them room to roam and letting them live out their lives naturally. There’s no antibiotics or growth stimulants used to speed things along. There’s no artificial ingredients or preservatives here, because we take the word natural seriously. We don’t over process this meat, we just do what it takes to get it from our farms to your plate in as few steps as possible. You’ll also see that this sausage contains zero sugar - completely sugar free. That means it’s Whole30 Approved, as well as being Keto and Paleo friendly. You’re gonna love it.

subscribableProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED BEEF HOT DOGS (5 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
Five (5) 12 oz. packages.

We’ll be frank, hot dogs have gotten a bad rap. We don’t think it has to be that way. There’s so much going for a good hot dog, and we’ve made the best of the best here. We do have to admit that our bacon dogs are close contenders. What you need to know is that these are 100% grass-fed beef, so you won’t have to wonder what it is you’re eating while you’re enjoying them. You’ll have peace of mind that there’s no preservatives, no artificial ingredients, and best of all - NO SUGAR in these dogs. That’s right, these are Whole30 Approved and Keto/Paleo friendly. Throw these on the grill, and you’ll have a quick turnaround, high quality protein the whole family can enjoy.

Serve these up to your family, your friends, and be ready to send them our way when they start asking questions. We leave out anything that isn’t necessary, all that’s left is quality meat. These hot dogs are sourced from animals that are cared for, brought up without growth stimulants or antibiotics, and allowed to grow at a natural pace. We make the best better at Pederson’s, and we do it with you and your family in mind.

subscribableProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED DRY RUB BACON (4 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

Let me tell you, this bacon took some time to perfect. Long hours, weekends, batch after batch. Bottom line, seasonings are a serious topic at Pederson's, and this bacon speaks to that fact. We rub this uncured bacon in a top secret recipe. The one thing we can tell you is that there's no sugar in it. That's all we're gonna give away. Well, that and the juniper berries. We love those juniper berries.

So, it's rubbed with and rolled in the secret spices. It's smoked the old fashioned way, with chipped wood over fire. Our Vice President Neil Dudley hums 'Amarillo By Morning' while it's sliced. This bacon goes through minimal processing, but 'Amarillo By Morning' always gets hummed.

We're talking about a bacon that's Whole30 approved, friendly to the AIP diet, and Keto and Paleo ready. There's no MSG here, no gluten, no lactose - and we do it without adding nitrates or nitrites. We may like to spin a yarn here and there, but this bacon is about as good as it gets. Pederson's Natural Farms makes the best, better.

subscribableProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED KIELBASA (4 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
Four (4) 14 oz. packages.

Kielbasa is the Polish word for sausage, and that’s where this sausage claims its roots. Often served with fried onions and cooked a multitude of ways, this sausage is versatile. You can grill it, boil it, smoke it, sear it, slice it up and kebab it - bottom line, you can get creative. This sausage is fully cooked, so it can save you time without sparing any flavor.

It may make for a quick meal, but you should know this sausage wasn’t made by cutting corners. Pederson’s Natural Farms raises animals the slow way, without growth stimulants or antibiotics. This pork was raised on a vegetarian diet free from animal by-products on farms where they have room to roam. Every step taken to get this product to your plate is essential, with no extra preservatives or artificial ingredients added in. There’s also no sugar here, so this meat is Whole30 Approved as well as being Keto and Paleo friendly. This is truly all natural protein for you and your family, and we wouldn’t have it any other way.

You can grill it, boil it, smoke it, sear it, slice it up and kebab it - bottom line, you can get creative. This sausage is fully cooked, so it can save you time without sparing any flavor.

It may make for a quick meal, but you should know this sausage wasn’t made by cutting corners. Pederson’s Natural Farms raises animals the slow way, without growth stimulants or antibiotics. This pork was raised on a vegetarian diet free from animal by-products on farms where they have room to roam. Every step taken to get this product to your plate is essential, with no extra preservatives or artificial ingredients added in. There’s also no sugar here, so this meat is Whole30 Approved as well as being Keto and Paleo friendly. This is truly all natural protein for you and your family, and we wouldn’t have it any other way.

subscribableProducts.title: ORGANIC NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED SMOKED BACON (4 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
Four (4) 8 oz. packages.

Food starts with farmers. Old fashioned food starts with old fashioned approaches. We are no strangers to technology, but we are strangers to cutting corners. We're strangers to putting profit over product. These organic products are about attaining the highest of quality for everyone involved. We work with self-sustaining family farms, good stewards of land and animals alike. We have and feel an ethical obligation to provide our animals with a comfortable life. Not only do our farmers raise their pigs right, but they also grow much of the grain used to feed those pigs. This makes for a higher quality feed that's always free of animal by-products. These animals live in open pens, they get to see the sky. They have open air. They romp, frolic, and engage in natural behavior. Our pigs grow slower than those at industrial “farms,” and we don't mind. It's more natural because we raise pigs without growth hormones or antibiotics. It’s a better life for the pigs and produces the best pork we’ve ever eaten.

We’ve partnered with these farmers because they share our values. Our goal is to produce the best bacon in the best ways. Our pork bellies are never injected with anything at any point in the process. No liquid smoke… ever. We use straight from the kitchen real, natural seasonings. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients. Next, we smoke the bellies using real wood chips. A smoky flavor should come from actually smoking the meat instead of faking it with liquid smoke. Our final step is to slice the chilled bellies into strips of bacon and put it in a package. Easy enough, right? Seasoned. Smoked. Sliced. It’s a natural process with no complicated steps… kind of like our uncured bacon… no nonsense, just natural. Whole30 Approved.

INGREDIENTS: ORGANIC PORK, WATER, VINEGAR (MADE WITH ORGANIC INGREDIENTS), SALT, CELERY POWDER.

subscribableProducts.title: SPIRAL SLICED NO SUGAR ADDED BONELESS SMOKED UNCURED HAM (1 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
One (1) 4-6 lb. ham.

These fully cooked spiral sliced hams, well they just can’t be beat. We tried. We bested ourselves until we were plum tuckered out. That’s how we got here. Trial and error, to spice or not to spice until every amount was just right. We think we found a winner, and we’re sure you’ll agree. These hams are the traditional go-to option for family holidays for good reason, but we’re here to tell you that they aren’t just for holidays. They’re for all sorts of days. Thursdays, Fridays, even Mondays deserve some of the best ham you’ll find on the face of the earth. That’s how confident we are in these hams. We’re proud of these 4-6lb boneless behemoths. They’re as at home next to a turkey and a pot of mashed potatoes as they are between slices of bread - or thickly cut across the plate from a pair of over-easy eggs. Endless options we’ll leave you to explore.

Like the rest of the products our customers have come to love, these are produced lovingly and with quality in mind. We don’t just believe in quality products but in quality of life for the animals that help us make them. Pederson’s Natural Farms works with farmers that care about their animals - they’re raised naturally without growth stimulants or antibiotics. They have room to roam. They’re fed exclusively on vegetarian feed, with no animal by-products. There’s no preservatives or artificial ingredients, and these hams make it to your table with no more processing than absolutely necessary to ensure their quality. You won’t find any added sugar here either, so they’re a high quality source of protein that’s Whole30 Approved, Keto and Paleo friendly.

subscribableProducts.title: SWEET GERMAN BRAND SMOKED UNCURED SAUSAGE (4 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
Four (4) 14 oz. packages.

Traditional German seasoning with a sweeter side, this smoked sausage has a flavor profile filled with nuance. This sausage is fully cooked, so it’s a meat that can be leaned on when you’re short on time - without being short on taste. Warm it up in the oven, on a pan, or throw it over flames. You’ll have no shortage of options here. Pederson’s line of rope sausages have a taste for every palate and are people pleasers every time they hit a plate.

You expect high standards and quality when you purchase Pederson’s products, and this sausage is no different. Sourced from animals that have room to roam, animals that are fed strictly vegetarian feed without the use of any animal by-products. We don’t believe in bringing up animals on antibiotics or growth stimulants, and you won’t find those here. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients, with minimal processing to bring it to your table. The Pederson’s difference starts on the farm and follows with every step in the process.

subscribableProducts.title: THE ORIGINAL NO SUGAR ADDED HICKORY SMOKED UNCURED BACON (4 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

The original. The bacon that blazed its path across the pork landscape and made Pederson's a household name. This is bacon without sugar. Simple enough, right? Turns out making bacon without artificial nitrates or nitrites is tough. Take sugar out of the equation and, for many, well you have a down-right conundrum. Then the cowboys and cowgirls at Pederson's Natural Farms went and did it. The rest is history. If you want to get in on that, here's your chance. This bacon will change the way you look at bacon, and you'll want more of it. This is Whole30 Approved. It's AIP diet friendly. It fits right into Paleo and Keto lifestyles.

The process of getting this bacon from pasture to plate is whittled down to the essentials. Minimal processing. The seasonings get soaked in over time, not injected all at once. Slabs of pork smoked by all natural hickory chips and perfectly sliced. Humanely raised, these animals get the life they deserve, with no growth stimulants or antibiotics. You won't find any MSG, gluten, or lactose here. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients. All natural uncured bacon. If there's a better way to make bacon, we haven't found it yet.

subscribableProducts.title: UNCURED NO SUGAR ADDED HICKORY SMOKED TURKEY BACON (4 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

Turkey and bacon. To be honest, without the word ‘and’ in that sentence, it's kind of an odd statement. Isn't bacon made from the belly of a pig? Well, yes. Thing is, even we'll admit that sometimes pork doesn't have to be on the menu. So we did our best to come up with something we'd be proud to eat when we weren't looking to eat pork. The results, well, you'll have to taste them for yourself (we're pretty proud).

When these turkeys hatch, we make sure someone is there to oink at them. Once they're old enough to fend for themselves, they're raised next to our pigs and grow up side by side. We're pretty sure these turkeys think they're pigs.

That might not all be true, but it's fun to imagine. What is true is that we slice this turkey like bacon. We season this turkey like bacon, and we smoke it with natural hickory chips. Just like our bacon. It's uncured, and there's no sugar added. No artificial ingredients and no preservatives. This turkey isn't raised in cages, and it gets a chance to grow with no antibiotics or growth stimulants - ever. This MSG and gluten free bird bacon is perfect for the Paleo or Keto lifestyle, and we invite you to try it today. Whole30 Approved.

subscribableProducts.title: UNCURED NO SUGAR BUCKIN' BACON (4 PACK)
subscribableProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

This bacon bucks trends, then starts them. Pederson's Buckin' Bacon comes from the center of the pork shoulder instead of the belly. This makes for bacon that's much more lean, which makes for a product that's higher in protein and lower in fat. It's a beautiful cut and has earned its place in our product line. This is a good place to start for a low fat, high protein alternative to traditional bacon. It's an artisanal style with a practical purpose and a taste all its own. There's no sugar added, so it's Whole30 Approved. It's also safe to eat for those of us adhering to the AIP diet or living a Keto or Paleo lifestyle.

Like the rest of Pederson's Natural Farms products, this meat is raised humanely. There's no antibiotics or growth stimulants here. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients, no added nitrates or nitrites. All natural seasoning and as little processing as possible to get it on your plate. You can taste the difference. We hang our hat on the quality of our products.

availableProducts.title: THE ORIGINAL NO SUGAR ADDED HICKORY SMOKED UNCURED BACON (4 PACK)
availableProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

The original. The bacon that blazed its path across the pork landscape and made Pederson's a household name. This is bacon without sugar. Simple enough, right? Turns out making bacon without artificial nitrates or nitrites is tough. Take sugar out of the equation and, for many, well you have a down-right conundrum. Then the cowboys and cowgirls at Pederson's Natural Farms went and did it. The rest is history. If you want to get in on that, here's your chance. This bacon will change the way you look at bacon, and you'll want more of it. This is Whole30 Approved. It's AIP diet friendly. It fits right into Paleo and Keto lifestyles.

The process of getting this bacon from pasture to plate is whittled down to the essentials. Minimal processing. The seasonings get soaked in over time, not injected all at once. Slabs of pork smoked by all natural hickory chips and perfectly sliced. Humanely raised, these animals get the life they deserve, with no growth stimulants or antibiotics. You won't find any MSG, gluten, or lactose here. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients. All natural uncured bacon. If there's a better way to make bacon, we haven't found it yet.

availableProducts.title: 100% GRASS-FED ORGANIC GROUND BEEF (3 PACK)
availableProducts.description:
We’re gonna be straight shooters here. This isn’t your run of the mill supermarket shelf beef. In the past, you’d have to know someone that was raising their own cows to find this kind of beef. You’d have to go to the butcher. You’d have to establish a relationship with someone that cared deeply about the meat they were producing. In that equation, we’re that someone. That’s the work we’ve done to bring you this beef. We care greatly about the quality of the protein we eat ourselves, the protein we serve our families, and lastly the protein we send to you. We’ve made it so that you just have to visit our website to bring the best to your door, and it’s out of a mission to bring people the highest quality experience and product. We want to build that relationship with you, and be your go-to source for high-quality protein you can depend on.

This beef is 100% grass-fed. Not grass-started, grass-sometimes, or grass-finished. No GMO’s or pesticides here. No artificial ingredients or preservatives. This meat has never been exposed to any growth stimulants or antibiotics, and it’s handled with care from pasture to plate. It’s 1lb of 85% lean beef, and nothing else. Whole30 approved, Keto and Paleo-friendly - this is the best made better.

availableProducts.title: UNCURED BEEF BACON (4 PACK)
availableProducts.description:
Four (4) 10 oz. packages.

Do you love beef? Do you love bacon? Well, do we have something for you. You read the headline right... this is beef bacon. It's packed with protein. It cooks up something beautiful, and its uses are endless. This meat is versatile. Want to use it where you'd usually use bacon? Go for it. Want to use it where you'd usually use beef? That's gonna turn out well. Ever had a beef BLT? A beef wrapped jalapeno popper? How about a beef bacon wrapped filet mignon? You can do that now. Put this on a plate, and conversation will commence.  

Like the rest of Pederson's line, this is about quality food. Food we make for our own families. There's nothing artificial in this beef. No antibiotics, ever. No growth stimulants, ever. This is fresh and preservative free meat from farmers that take pride in their products. This is from Pederson's - where we make the best better.

availableProducts.title: ORGANIC NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED SMOKED BACON (4 PACK)
availableProducts.description:
Four (4) 8 oz. packages.

Food starts with farmers. Old fashioned food starts with old fashioned approaches. We are no strangers to technology, but we are strangers to cutting corners. We're strangers to putting profit over product. These organic products are about attaining the highest of quality for everyone involved. We work with self-sustaining family farms, good stewards of land and animals alike. We have and feel an ethical obligation to provide our animals with a comfortable life. Not only do our farmers raise their pigs right, but they also grow much of the grain used to feed those pigs. This makes for a higher quality feed that's always free of animal by-products. These animals live in open pens, they get to see the sky. They have open air. They romp, frolic, and engage in natural behavior. Our pigs grow slower than those at industrial “farms,” and we don't mind. It's more natural because we raise pigs without growth hormones or antibiotics. It’s a better life for the pigs and produces the best pork we’ve ever eaten.

We’ve partnered with these farmers because they share our values. Our goal is to produce the best bacon in the best ways. Our pork bellies are never injected with anything at any point in the process. No liquid smoke… ever. We use straight from the kitchen real, natural seasonings. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients. Next, we smoke the bellies using real wood chips. A smoky flavor should come from actually smoking the meat instead of faking it with liquid smoke. Our final step is to slice the chilled bellies into strips of bacon and put it in a package. Easy enough, right? Seasoned. Smoked. Sliced. It’s a natural process with no complicated steps… kind of like our uncured bacon… no nonsense, just natural. Whole30 Approved.

INGREDIENTS: ORGANIC PORK, WATER, VINEGAR (MADE WITH ORGANIC INGREDIENTS), SALT, CELERY POWDER.

availableProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED OLD WORLD KIELBASA (4 PACK)
availableProducts.description:
Four (4) 14 oz. packages.

 

 

Pederson’s received a lot of requests for this Old World Kielbasa. We’re big on bringing products our customers are searching for to market and then straight to their front door. This rope sausage doesn’t have any added sugar, and it’s old-fashioned seasoning makes it a hit wherever it lands. It has a traditional kielbasa flavor profile that compliments a wide variety of dinner staples, and according to our in-house tasting team of Pederson's kiddos, it’s a sausage that’s sure to be in high demand amongst your family.

The pork this sausage is made from is humanely raised. Our animals aren’t subjected to growth stimulants or antibiotics, and they’re brought up on high quality vegetarian feed that’s free from animal by-products. You won’t find any MSG or lactose here, and we never use artificial ingredients or preservatives. This sausage comes in gluten free without any added sugar, and there’s no artificial nitrates or nitrites to be found. This is a Whole30 Approved protein the whole family can enjoy!

availableProducts.title: UNCURED NO SUGAR BUCKIN' BACON (4 PACK)
availableProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

This bacon bucks trends, then starts them. Pederson's Buckin' Bacon comes from the center of the pork shoulder instead of the belly. This makes for bacon that's much more lean, which makes for a product that's higher in protein and lower in fat. It's a beautiful cut and has earned its place in our product line. This is a good place to start for a low fat, high protein alternative to traditional bacon. It's an artisanal style with a practical purpose and a taste all its own. There's no sugar added, so it's Whole30 Approved. It's also safe to eat for those of us adhering to the AIP diet or living a Keto or Paleo lifestyle.

Like the rest of Pederson's Natural Farms products, this meat is raised humanely. There's no antibiotics or growth stimulants here. No preservatives, no artificial ingredients, no added nitrates or nitrites. All natural seasoning and as little processing as possible to get it on your plate. You can taste the difference. We hang our hat on the quality of our products.

availableProducts.title: UNCURED NO SUGAR ADDED HICKORY SMOKED TURKEY BACON (4 PACK)
availableProducts.description:
Four (4) 10oz. packages.

Turkey and bacon. To be honest, without the word ‘and’ in that sentence, it's kind of an odd statement. Isn't bacon made from the belly of a pig? Well, yes. Thing is, even we'll admit that sometimes pork doesn't have to be on the menu. So we did our best to come up with something we'd be proud to eat when we weren't looking to eat pork. The results, well, you'll have to taste them for yourself (we're pretty proud).

When these turkeys hatch, we make sure someone is there to oink at them. Once they're old enough to fend for themselves, they're raised next to our pigs and grow up side by side. We're pretty sure these turkeys think they're pigs.

That might not all be true, but it's fun to imagine. What is true is that we slice this turkey like bacon. We season this turkey like bacon, and we smoke it with natural hickory chips. Just like our bacon. It's uncured, and there's no sugar added. No artificial ingredients and no preservatives. This turkey isn't raised in cages, and it gets a chance to grow with no antibiotics or growth stimulants - ever. This MSG and gluten free bird bacon is perfect for the Paleo or Keto lifestyle, and we invite you to try it today. Whole30 Approved.

Let me tell you, this bacon took some time to perfect. Long hours, weekends, batch after batch. Bottom line, seasonings are a serious topic at Pederson's, and this bacon speaks to that fact. We rub this uncured bacon in a top secret recipe. The one thing we can tell you is that there's no sugar in it. That's all we're gonna give away. Well, that and the juniper berries. We love those juniper berries.

So, it's rubbed with and rolled in the secret spices. It's smoked the old fashioned way, with chipped wood over fire. Our Vice President Neil Dudley hums 'Amarillo By Morning' while it's sliced. This bacon goes through minimal processing, but 'Amarillo By Morning' always gets hummed.

We're talking about a bacon that's Whole30 approved, friendly to the AIP diet, and Keto and Paleo ready. There's no MSG here, no gluten, no lactose - and we do it without adding nitrates or nitrites. We may like to spin a yarn here and there, but this bacon is about as good as it gets. Pederson's Natural Farms makes the best, better.

availableProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED BEEF HOT DOGS (5 PACK)
availableProducts.description:
Five (5) 12 oz. packages.

We’ll be frank, hot dogs have gotten a bad rap. We don’t think it has to be that way. There’s so much going for a good hot dog, and we’ve made the best of the best here. We do have to admit that our bacon dogs are close contenders. What you need to know is that these are 100% grass-fed beef, so you won’t have to wonder what it is you’re eating while you’re enjoying them. You’ll have peace of mind that there’s no preservatives, no artificial ingredients, and best of all - NO SUGAR in these dogs. That’s right, these are Whole30 Approved and Keto/Paleo friendly. Throw these on the grill, and you’ll have a quick turnaround, high quality protein the whole family can enjoy.

Serve these up to your family, your friends, and be ready to send them our way when they start asking questions. We leave out anything that isn’t necessary, all that’s left is quality meat. These hot dogs are sourced from animals that are cared for, brought up without growth stimulants or antibiotics, and allowed to grow at a natural pace. We make the best better at Pederson’s, and we do it with you and your family in mind.

availableProducts.description:
Five (5) 16 oz. packages.

Features:

* Whole30 Approved, No Sugar added ground Italian sausage
* Vegetarian fed, raised humanely without antibiotics.
* Gluten, Lactose, and MSG free.
* Ships Frozen.

Like the rest of their product line, Pederson’s Natural Farms Italian Ground Sausage checks every box when it comes to health-conscious and humane protein production. This Italian Ground Sausage fits the bill, whether you’re putting it on pizza, in a pasta, or spicing up a perfectly balanced omelet. Pederson’s Italian Ground Sausage is minimally processed and infused with just the right amount of seasoning, without adding any sugar or artificial ingredients. It’ll cook up with a distinctive and characteristic Italian taste, yet that flavor profile strikes a balance with enough nuance to not overpower the rest of your dish. You’ll know it once you try it. If you’ve had Pederson's products in the past, you know they each set themselves apart from the competition in their own way. They make the best, better.

availableProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED DOUBLE SMOKED BRATWURST (5 PACK)
availableProducts.description:
Five (5) 12 oz. packages.

Fully cooked and double smoked, these bratwursts are bursting at the seams with smoked flavor. If you didn’t know, these are inspired by traditional German seasoning techniques and bring their own unique taste to your plate. This is Pederson’s ode to old-fashioned Bavarian sausage, and they fit in well with a wide variety of dishes. Grab yourself a pack or two and a few of the other link line sausages Pederson’s offers. You’ll have an opportunity to distinguish what sets these styles apart, all while enjoying some of the best all natural sausage on the market!

These brats don’t have any added sugar, and they’re sourced from animals that are raised with a quality of life necessary to make quality protein. Our farms feed their animals high quality, all vegetarian feed - no animal by-products to speak of. There’s no such thing as growth stimulants or antibiotics here... our animals are allowed to grow at a natural pace. We have patience because it takes patience to make a great product. You won’t find any artificial ingredients or preservatives here, and we don’t do any processing to these brats that isn’t absolutely necessary to deliver a quality product to you.

availableProducts.title: SPIRAL SLICED NO SUGAR ADDED BONELESS SMOKED UNCURED HAM (1 PACK)
availableProducts.description:
One (1) 4-6 lb. ham.

These fully cooked spiral sliced hams, well they just can’t be beat. We tried. We bested ourselves until we were plum tuckered out. That’s how we got here. Trial and error, to spice or not to spice until every amount was just right. We think we found a winner, and we’re sure you’ll agree. These hams are the traditional go-to option for family holidays for good reason, but we’re here to tell you that they aren’t just for holidays. They’re for all sorts of days. Thursdays, Fridays, even Mondays deserve some of the best ham you’ll find on the face of the earth. That’s how confident we are in these hams. We’re proud of these 4-6lb boneless behemoths. They’re as at home next to a turkey and a pot of mashed potatoes as they are between slices of bread - or thickly cut across the plate from a pair of over-easy eggs. Endless options we’ll leave you to explore.

Like the rest of the products our customers have come to love, these are produced lovingly and with quality in mind. We don’t just believe in quality products but in quality of life for the animals that help us make them. Pederson’s Natural Farms works with farmers that care about their animals - they’re raised naturally without growth stimulants or antibiotics. They have room to roam. They’re fed exclusively on vegetarian feed, with no animal by-products. There’s no preservatives or artificial ingredients, and these hams make it to your table with no more processing than absolutely necessary to ensure their quality. You won’t find any added sugar here either, so they’re a high quality source of protein that’s Whole30 Approved, Keto and Paleo friendly.

availableProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED UNCURED KIELBASA (4 PACK)
availableProducts.description:
Four (4) 14 oz. packages.

Kielbasa is the Polish word for sausage, and that’s where this sausage claims its roots. Often served with fried onions and cooked a multitude of ways, this sausage is versatile. You can grill it, boil it, smoke it, sear it, slice it up and kebab it - bottom line, you can get creative. This sausage is fully cooked, so it can save you time without sparing any flavor.

It may make for a quick meal, but you should know this sausage wasn’t made by cutting corners. Pederson’s Natural Farms raises animals the slow way, without growth stimulants or antibiotics. This pork was raised on a vegetarian diet free from animal by-products on farms where they have room to roam. Every step taken to get this product to your plate is essential, with no extra preservatives or artificial ingredients added in. There’s also no sugar here, so this meat is Whole30 Approved as well as being Keto and Paleo friendly. This is truly all natural protein for you and your family, and we wouldn’t have it any other way.

availableProducts.title: NO SUGAR ADDED SPICY BREAKFAST SAUSAGE (5 PACK)
availableProducts.description:
Five (5) 16 oz. packages.

We like spicing things up around here, and this No Sugar Added Spicy Breakfast Sausage is a result of that. This is one for the books, and we’ll wager it’s the best on the market. It’s just that good. We know the word breakfast is in the title, but don’t let that stop you from eating it any time of day. This no sugar sausage is at home in a taco as it is next to eggs. You’ll have no problem spicing up your meals with this meat, and it’ll leave folks coming back for more.

A big part of this sausage being the best starts at the farm. Our farmers take care of their animals, giving them room to roam and letting them live out their lives naturally. There’s no antibiotics or growth stimulants used to speed things along. There’s no artificial ingredients or preservatives here, because we take the word natural seriously. We don’t over process this meat, we just do what it takes to get it from our farms to your plate in as few steps as possible. You’ll also see that this sausage contains zero sugar - completely sugar free. That means it’s Whole30 Approved, as well as being Keto and Paleo friendly. You’re gonna love it.

availableProducts.title: ST. LOUIS STYLE RIBS
availableProducts.description:
Pederson’s pork comes from Duroc-sired hogs making it some of the juiciest, most tender pork you can find! A product of the United States, their pork is beautifully pink in color and perfectly marbled.

St. Louis Style Ribs come from the hogs underbelly or lower rib cage. Also known as spare ribs, this tasty cut has more fat than baby back ribs.

availableProducts.title: BONELESS COUNTRY STYLE RIBS
availableProducts.description:
Pederson’s pork comes from Duroc-sired hogs making it some of the juiciest, most tender pork you can find! A product of the United States, their pork is beautifully pink in color and perfectly marbled.

These boneless ribs are cut from the upper side of the rib cage, from the fatty blade end of the loin on the hog’s back. These are cut into individual ribs.

availableProducts.title: PORK TENDERLOIN
availableProducts.description:
Pederson’s pork comes from Duroc-sired hogs making it some of the juiciest, most tender pork you can find! A product of the United States, their pork is beautifully pink in color and perfectly marbled.

Pork tenderloin is the leanest, most tender cut from the inside of the tail end of the loin on the hogs back. It is much smaller than a pork loin roast, so it cooks quickly and is a great choice for weeknight meals. Avoid drying it out by not over cooking.

availableProducts.title: BABY BACK RIBS
availableProducts.description:
Pederson’s pork comes from Duroc-sired hogs making it some of the juiciest, most tender pork you can find! A product of the United States, their pork is beautifully pink in color and perfectly marbled.

This cut is taken from the hogs rib cage near the backbone. These tasty ribs are meatier than St. Louis Style Ribs and cook more quickly.

availableProducts.title: BONELESS THICK CUT CHOP
availableProducts.description:
Pederson’s pork comes from Duroc-sired hogs making it some of the juiciest, most tender pork you can find! A product of the United States, their pork is beautifully pink in color and perfectly marbled.

These chops come from the center of the loin located on the back of the hog. Because boneless chops can dry out quickly, be sure not to overcook.

availableProducts.title: ALL NATURAL GROUND BISON
availableProducts.description:
Sing it with me, now, “Oh, give me a home where the buffalo… er… bison roam.” Incredibly lean and nutrient packed, our Ground Bison is Whole30 Approved and full of flavor. Packed with protein, use it in place of ground beef.

Our bison is raised without the use of antibiotics or growth stimulants and fed no animal by-products… EVER! Minimally processed, no artificial ingredients, no preservatives, no nitrates or nitrites, no gluten, no lactose, no MSG, and NO sweeteners! Whole30 Approved. 16oz.
